import React from 'react'; import "./Contact.css" const Contact = () => { return (

Home Address

199 2nd street

Apartment E310

Mineola NY 11501

Contact Information

  • e-mail: karimhafiz7@gmail.com
  • Cell: (917)-545-6181
  • LinkedIn

Client Contact Form






You can find me by clicking the links below!

); }; export default Contact;
